description: This will open a read or write stream for a URI.

parameters.description: This is the streamId that will be associated with this open URI stream.
parameters.name: streamId

parameters.description: This is the URI of the stream to open.
parameters.name: uri

parameters.description: This is the access mode string. Values can be "r" for read or "w" for write.
parameters.name: mode

parameters.description: If specified and true, this will automatically flush the stream's buffers after every write.
parameters.name: autoFlush

returns.description: The streamNumber for the streamId or -1 if there was an error. Use get_stream_error() for error information.
